place_info.title: Dr. Jash Ajmera | Psychiatrist and Psychotherapist in Surat | Sadbhav Neuropsychiatry Clinic
place_info.address: 209 vesu point, Vesu Main Road, above HDFC Bank, opp. vijya laxmi hall, Surat, Gujarat 395007, India

reviews.snippet: I have suffered from OCD and IBS for 12 years, which greatly impacted my life. Since starting treatment with Dr. Jash Ajmera, I’ve seen remarkable improvement and now live a happier, anxiety-free life. His expertise and compassionate care are exceptional, and I’m grateful he visits Ankleshwar every Saturday. He has truly been life-changing, and I highly recommend him to anyone facing similar challenges.

reviews.snippet: Dr. Jash Ajmera is young and energetic Doctor, his behaviour is polite enough. Staff is also cooperative. I am consulting for my friend and he is recovering better. Recommended for others.

reviews.snippet: I had a great experience consulting Dr. Jash Ajmera for my panic attacks. He is incredibly positive and made me feel comfortable, answering all my mental health questions without hesitation. Thanks to his treatment, I’m now fully recovered. The clinic staff is also excellent and supportive. Highly recommend!

reviews.snippet: The counselling given by Dr Jash Ajmera is excellent, he understands every issue and addresses them in a very good manner. I feel much better after consulting him.

reviews.snippet:
Dear Dr. Jash Ajamera,

I wanted to express my heartfelt appreciation for the exceptional treatment andsupport you have provided regarding my wife's treatment. Your insights and dedication have been invaluable in guiding us through this journey. Your expertise and compassionate approach have not only brought clarity but also instilled confidence in the treatment plan. We are deeply grateful for your commitment to her well-being and for going above and beyond in your care.Thank you for making such a positive difference in our lives.

Warm regards,
Hasmukh Khalasi
